title: A Bird of prey: the red-tailed hawk
creator_credit: Edward C. Harris and Encyclopaedia Britannica Films
brief_description: Examines the life cycle of a red-tailed hawk. Shows the physical qualities that help the hawk to survive. Establishes the importance of the red-tailed hawk in maintaining ecological balance. Conveys the reasons for the hawk’s decline in numbers.
